name: The Tower (itch) (dunkelgrau)
description:
Submission for Godot Wild Jam #27. Theme: Books

Note: The HTML version can be laggy for some browsers.

Content: There is a tower of knowledge, watched by a mighty witch. Study the ancient spells inside her legendary magic books and combine them wisely. Find your favorite synergies to defeat the witch and her companions.

Controls: WASD and Mouse Left Button

Programming and graphics: dunkelgrau
Sound: dunkelgrau, qualkappe
Music: Giovanni Puocci, Royalty Free Zone
Font: Ænigma Fonts
